title: When irrigation backfires: Global farming practices are driving heat stress and water strain, research warns
description: Three new high-profile studies led by Dr. Yi Yao (Vrije Universiteit Brussel and ETH Zurich) show that while irrigation may be seen as a tool to dampen heat extremes, its benefits will come with adverse impacts.

title: Lokal launches AgriLokal to connect farmers with expert agronomists in local languages
description: The platform aims to address key challenges in Indian agriculture — where nearly 80% of farmers have never received formal training — by offering real-time, localised advice on soil health, irrigation, pest control, and modern practices.
content:
